short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Acedit: Your AI interview coach. Enhance your job interviews with real-time prompts, AI suggestions, and practice questions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

🎙️ Real-time prompting in your online interviews
💡 AI-generated response suggestions based on your profile
📝 Personalised preparation with job-specific practice questions
🔍 Automatic job listing parser
📔 Automated targeted Cover Letter generation
💰 Generous Free tier available to get started

Why Acedit?

• Real-time prompting reminds you of your key examples during the interview
• AI-suggested talking points help structure your responses
• Practice & simulation mode with common and job-specific questions
• Seamless integration with popular job listing websites

Acedit aims to reduce interview anxiety and help you present your best self. It's not about providing pre-written answers, but supporting you with relevant information when you need it most.

Upgrade your interview preparation with Acedit – Your supportive companion for job interviews.
